name: Hard Rock Crush & Pop
description:
Join us on a worldwide adventure through amazing locations around the world!

Play the most addictive match 3 puzzle game for free, travel along the map, collect awesome items and complete your card collection. Indulge yourself in this extremely addicting match 3 puzzle journey, swap and crush your way through hundreds of fun levels, beat the challenges and clear levels.

Hard Rock Puzzle Match is a fun online board game available for free on the play store and perfect for your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch. With beautiful graphics and designs, cool collection items and exclusive boosters, you simply won’t put it down!

Love logic and puzzle board games?
Play now and test your puzzle solving skills as you progress through the game. Clear levels to unlock additional puzzles and surprises as you explore exciting landmarks and cities around the world.

• Make rows of at least 3 items to remove them and clear the board.
• Win levels and claim the prize!
• Overcome the obstacles and collect awesome collection pieces.
• Make special matches and combinations to unlock unique boosters that will help you blast through the challenges.
• Solve all the puzzles and collect quest cards on your exciting journey!

Hard Rock Puzzle Match Features:
• Advance along the map, visit the different cities and complete the challenges.
• Spin the wheel and win awesome daily bonuses.
• Match 3 items to create a line blast and win points.
• Unlock special prizes and claim the collection!
• Challenge yourself with the exciting match-3 puzzles.
• Play and enjoy amazing puzzle levels in this fun addicting board game.
• Reach high scores and try to get 3 stars on every level.
• Clear the board and win cool bonus gift cards.
• Boost your experience with power-ups.
• Enjoy this fun colorful puzzle matching game!

Travel the World!
• Start your adventure now! Download for free to your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch and advance along the map, matching items and solving puzzles. From London to Las Vegas, New Delhi and Barcelona, visit all the famous locations and find out what each city has in store for you!

Match 3 Exciting Adventure
• Enjoy your time exploring iconic landmarks, visit the London Eye and the Big Ben, take a walk along the Vegas Strip and book your stay at the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino.
• Take a tour of the Bahai Lotus Temple and the Red Fort at New Delhi, and don’t miss a fun stroll down Las Ramblas Street or a visit to the amazing La Sagrada Familia in Barcelona.

Discover the Memorabilia Collection
• Each city has a special set that you have to complete, match the items, win levels and claim the card. Are you ready to embark on this incredible puzzle matching adventure?
• Slide and match amazing items, make powerful combos and master the challenges!

Play with Friends!
• Share scores and achievements. Send and receive lives from your Hark Rock friends.
• Play anytime and anywhere you like, it’s completely free and no WiFi connection is required.
• Play now Hard Rock Puzzle Match, complete the memorabilia musical collection and win!
• Follow us on the social network for news, fun updates and plenty of other surprises!
